titles.title: Gundam Build Fighters: GM no Gyakushuu
ガンダムビルドファイターズ GMの逆襲
Gundam Build Fighters: GM`s Counterattack

anime.description: The day before the ceremony marking the completion of the Yajima Stadium, http://anidb.net/ch61686 [Nils Nielsen] invites http://anidb.net/ch57667 [Iori Sei], http://anidb.net/ch61682 [Meijin Kawaguchi], and others to an exhibition battle using the new large-scale battle system he has designed. Now that they are all reunited, Sei attempts to show off the http://anidb.net/ch91122 [Build Strike Cosmos] that he has upgraded for the exhibition, but then he notices something missing... Meanwhile, somebody takes control of the stadium`s systems, sealing Sei and the others inside. Before them appears a mysterious group, which has come to challenge them to Gunpla Battle. Source: gundam.info

character.name: Kousaka China
character.description: China is a first year student at the middle school section of the Seifuu Private Academy, class president, and member of the art club. Her home is the restaurant Kousaka. As she watches http://anidb.net/ch57667 [Sei] get interested in Gundam plastic model battles, she herself becomes intrigued with the sport. She has a wise and reserved personality. Her chest is also "reserved." Source: ANN

character.name: Iori Sei
character.description: Sei is a first year student at the middle school section of the Seifuu Private Academy. As he is the son of the Iori Model Shop, he has enjoyed Gundam plastic models since he was young. His knowledge of Gundam and making Gundam models are far beyond an adult`s. However, he is unfamilar when it comes to Gundam plastic model battles, and always gets eliminated in the first round of the championship. Source: ANN

character.name: Yasaka Mao
character.description: Mao is a Gundam plastic model builder from Kyoto. He has been taught how to create Gundam plastic models since he was young. He appears to be spacey due to his appearance and Kansai dialect, but he in fact has a hot fighting spirit in his heart. He is a good rival of http://anidb.net/ch57667 [Sei]`s. Source: ANN

character.name: Ricardo Fellini
character.description: Ricardo Fellini is a regular competitor at the Gundam plastic model championship, and the representative for Italy. His other name is Italy`s Dandy Man. After arriving in Japan after traveling around the entire world, he has a fateful meeting with http://anidb.net/ch57668 [Reiji]. His hobby is searching for girls to hit on using Gundam plastic models, and he boasts that it has an 80% rate of success. Source: ANN

character.name: KUMA-03 Beargguy III
character.description: The first original Gunpla made by Kousaka China. Based on the Beargguy from GUNPLA BUILDERS BEGINNING G, it was completed with her own original concept of a cute stuffed animal turned into a robot. Although this is China`s first attempt at model-building, because she is also a member of the art club, the painting is extremely well done. Source: Official Website

character.name: Meijin Kawaguchi
character.description: A Gunpla builder who became famous when Gundam plastic models were first released. His works were praised as being made by the hand of God, and he was singled out as a Meijin. The Meijin`s title was handed down through the generations, and Yuuki Tatsuya is now the third to inherit the Kawaguchi name. Source: Official Website

character.name: Nils Nielsen
character.description: A scientific prodigy known as the Early Genius. Though this is his first time in the Gunpla Battle Championship, he is aiming for the World Tournament with the Sengoku Astray Gundam he created using his amazing intellect. Source: Official Website
